component:
​ owon-vds-tiny ​ OWON VDS1022 Oscilloscope ​ Application for the OWON VDS1022 oscilloscope ​
Unofficial release with a few fixes and improvements: * New shortcuts: single trigger, trigger level, offsets, coupling, inversion, reset ... * Disabled annoying dock animations * Disabled leave/stop confirmation while recording/playing * ... ​ owon-vds-tiny.desktop ​ https://github.com/florentbr/Owon-VDS1022 ​ owon-vds-tiny florentbr@gmail.com ​
